plays.text: Penalty to Karel Rachunek 2 minutes for Roughing John Madden
Penalty to Jeff Friesen 2 minutes for Crosschecking Wade Redden
Penalty to Daniel Alfredsson 2 minutes for Tripping Jay Pandolfo
Goal scored by Grant Marshall assisted by Patrik Elias and Scott Niedermayer
Penalty to Colin White 2 minutes for Hooking Martin Havlat
Penalty to Jim McKenzie 2 minutes for Hooking Zdeno Chara
Goal scored by Karel Rachunek assisted by Daniel Alfredsson
Penalty to Todd White 2 minutes for Interference Jeff Friesen
Goal scored by Vaclav Varada assisted by Wade Redden and Bryan Smolinski
Penalty to Vaclav Varada 2 minutes for High Sticking Scott Stevens
Goal scored by Jay Pandolfo assisted by John Madden and Scott Niedermayer
Penalty to Daniel Alfredsson 2 minutes for Roughing Scott Gomez
Goal scored by Jeff Friesen assisted by Brian Rafalski and Joe Nieuwendyk
Goal scored by Patrik Elias assisted by Colin White
Penalty to Scott Niedermayer 2 minutes for Hooking Bryan Smolinski
Goal scored by John Madden assisted by Jay Pandolfo and Brian Rafalski
Penalty to Jamie Langenbrunner 2 minutes for Unsportsmanlike Conduct Vaclav Varada
Penalty to Vaclav Varada 2 minutes for Unsportsmanlike Conduct Jamie Langenbrunner
Penalty to Jim McKenzie 2 minutes for Roughing(opposing player not identified)
